body_html:
@sareg0 there is a bug that causes the value of the radio button kind to be ignored and so I am afraid none of your updates have been persisted :(

I have just pushed the fix and it should be deployed momentarily. The commits include a new organizer-scoped teams controller https://teams.railsgirlssummerofcode.org/orga/teams where you should be able to update the team's state. Can I ask you (or somebody else) to flag all the accepted teams for this year again ?

body:
@sareg0 there is a bug that causes the value of the radio button `kind` to be ignored and so I am afraid none of your updates have been persisted :( 

I have just pushed the fix and it should be deployed momentarily. The commits include a new organizer-scoped teams controller https://teams.railsgirlssummerofcode.org/orga/teams where you should be able to update the team's state. Can I ask you (or somebody else) to flag all the accepted teams for this year _again_ ?
